name: Glitchy Guy
description:
Glitchy guy is a simple platformer game in which the player can travel between dimensions to see the platforms not visible in another.

It is made for BYOG 2021 Game jam in 48 hours.

The theme is  'Two Views'.

Some buildings are visible in both (Brown buildings)

Other buildings( Red and Blue) are only visible in one of the dimensions.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left CTRL - Switch Dimension

Space - Jump/ Climb

R - Reset to start

Player Model- Unity Asset Store

Animations- Mixamo.com

Sounds:

BG music- Breakdance Music

Sfx- Mixkit
